ModMetaData.name: Grizzled Gandalf
ModMetaData.author: Taggerung
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Grizzled Gandalf Storyteller. He will challenge you body and mind, impishly messing with your colony in a myriad of fun and frightening ways. With him watching over you, you will learn to expect the unexpected, and never trust a room is truly empty.
